list_definition.definition: to have a formal meeting with

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The Pope received the Queen in the Vatican.

list_definition.definition: to greet, react to, in some way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The news was received in silence

list_definition.definition: to accept (stolen goods) especially with the intention of reselling (them)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was found guilty of receiving stolen goods.
